name: NTP Service
description: Ensures time synchronization service is active.
check_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null; then systemctl is-active systemd-timesyncd || systemctl is-active ntp || echo skip; else echo skip; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null; then systemctl restart systemd-timesyncd || systemctl restart ntp || true; fi
